alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:34PM EST until February 21 at 7:30AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Maumee River At Waterville affecting Wood and Lucas Counties. For the Maumee River...including Grand Rapids, Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maumee River At Waterville. * WHEN...From this evening to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, flooding begins in Side Cut Metropark. The river is out of its banks in Waterville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage again late this evening to a crest of 11.6 feet tomorrow evening. It should then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning by 745 AM EST.
